concept: Analytics, User Management, and Security Monitor.
user_notes: Place the Security Monitor and Analytics dashboard screenshots in the monitor screens.
ai_image_prompt: A 3D voxel render of a 'Mission Control' center. A large curved console desk with multiple blank monitor screens facing the viewer. The screens should be dark glass (empty for overlays). The room feels like a sci-fi command center but built with blocks. Red and Blue status lights. In the background, a large digital map of the world. High contrast, professional but gamified look. No text on screens.
